title: Lost runes
body:
So I log in after the client went full blown crap. 
Logged in, went to play, did champ select and crap. 
Game bugsplats on loading, then proceeds to critical error when reattempting, THEN fatal crashes. 
Pre good right?
Went eff this, gave up, left for a few days, right away notice this.
That ALL my runes have been deleted and i think im down a page. 

Constant issues non stop but this what pissed me off. what the god damn hell man?

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to give you more info and *may* be able to restore the pages. They'll also be able to tell you if you have the correct number of pages.
